WorkItem.ClosedComment: this issue has been resolved in 0.8.1.0
WorkItem.Description:
I've install TypeScript 0.8.0.0 and I can run tsc from the command line.
I've create simple ts file and run the compiler on it but it does not produce any js file.
I've also try to use the -out parameter but it only produce an empty file.

Any ideas will help.

Thank you,
Ido.
WorkItem.Summary: tsc does not produce js file

Comments.Message:
I've attach the bad file.
I've found that it is something to do with the file encoding.
When I create new file using VS 2012 (Right click -> Add -> JavaScript) it does not work.
When I create a file using notepad is works.
